import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../CustomCursor.css';// Your CSS file for styling the cursor
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomCursor=()=>{const[position,setPosition]=useState({x:0,y:0});useEffect(()=>{const updatePosition=e=>{const cursorSize=20;// Adjust based on your cursor size
const x=e.clientX;const y=e.clientY;const windowWidth=window.innerWidth;const windowHeight=window.innerHeight;// Calculate the bounds so the cursor doesn't go off the screen
const newX=Math.min(windowWidth-cursorSize,Math.max(0,x));const newY=Math.min(windowHeight-cursorSize,Math.max(0,y));setPosition({x:newX,y:newY});};// Event listeners for mouse movement and window resizing
window.addEventListener('mousemove',updatePosition);window.addEventListener('scroll',updatePosition);window.addEventListener('resize',updatePosition);return()=>{// Clean up event listeners
